Author: intertropical
Text: If it helps at all, 400 calories is pretty “normal” for 11am, breakfasts of “normal eaters” usually contain at least that amount! Don’t beat yourself up for it. Besides, mental hunger/boredom eating also often means that your body does genuinely need food, especially if you’ve been restricting.  Maybe you can snack on fruits/veggies instead? Or make sure that you have an adequate breakfast with protein in it (to increase satiation) – I know it’s anxiety-inducing to eat more early in the morning, but it’s really helped me reduce grazing/overeating/bingeing later in the day. Good luck!!

Author: OverwhelmedAdenium
Text: Water water water🤪 if you HAVE to snack, veggies and fruits, they don’t add up as quick as chips and other snacks 🙈
